DOC.criteria: The patient must read , understood sign ICF . Age ≤ 42 year . Serum AMH ≥ 4 pM/L . Previous IVF cycle 5 metaphase II oocytes retrieval BMI < 30 . Will undergo IVF cycle array Preimplantation Genetic Screening . Semen sample concentration exceed 3 million/mL progressive motile sperm . Present history least one previous cycle IVF embryo transfer pregnancy due low embryo quality .
